andromeda.why: Modest, self-governed conduct is personal integrity work, not liberation/rescue.

arcturus.why: Establishes a baseline container of correct behavior—steadying rules of self-conduct.

draco.why: Early ‘right behavior’ anxiety can become status/correctness policing.

orion-dark.why: Grabbing rigid moral formulas as safety—obedience over authenticity.

orion-light.why: Micro-ordeal of restraint: humility and courage to behave rightly without fanfare.

pleiades.why: Focus is inner conduct, not bonding/soothing.

sirius.why: Pre-teaching conduct; no formal transmission yet.

arcturus.why: Quiet, consistent self-rules create a stable container for identity.

draco.why: Pushback can provoke ‘prove your behavior’ rank tests.

orion-dark.why: Retreating into rigid codes to avoid engagement.

orion-light.why: The ordeal is fidelity to one’s nature under scrutiny.

pleiades.why: Subtle attunement to when/with whom to share one’s way.

andromeda.why: Trial-and-error with behavior is self-mastery work, not rescue.

arcturus.why: Iteratively stabilizes rules of conduct under real pressure.

draco.why: Judgment can trigger defensive posturing and clique protection.

orion-dark.why: Conforming to external ‘virtue’ to escape blame—obedience capture.

orion-light.why: Initiatory grind: integrity is refined through mistakes and correction.

pleiades.why: Sensitivity to reception guides which behaviors are sustainable.

sirius.why: No codified teaching yet—this is personal forging.

andromeda.why: Socializing correct conduct is order-making, not chain-breaking.

arcturus.why: Translates personal ethics into usable norms and roles—cultural container.

draco.why: Success can attract behavior gatekeeping and status filters.

lyra.why: Embodied style of conduct can inspire as a cultural beacon.

orion-dark.why: Risk of moralizing into doctrinal compliance.

orion-light.why: Mentoring-by-example: others meet the ordeal of aligning to integrity.

pleiades.why: Relational timing/hospitality help norms be received rather than resisted.

sirius.why: Pedagogy-by-conduct: teaches right behavior through lived example.

andromeda.why: Refuses coercive norms; stands for self-sovereign conduct when projected on.

arcturus.why: Projection into ‘fix everyone’s behavior’ → burnout/scapegoat pattern.

draco.why: Authority aura can invite loyalty tests and clique enforcement.

lyra.why: Iconic conduct becomes a visible cultural signal.

orion-dark.why: Doctrine capture: enforcing moral obedience to preserve image.

orion-light.why: Integrity under projection—honorable refusal to perform false virtue.

sirius.why: Royal instruction-by-presence: model clean conduct despite projections.

andromeda.why: Guards self-sovereign behavior against coercion; refuses capture.

arcturus.why: Elder standard of conduct—stable, fair, and durable rules by example.

draco.why: Legacy authority can drift into status preservation or moral policing.

lyra.why: Role-model style of being becomes a cultural beacon.

orion-dark.why: Doctrine-lock: elevating code over living integrity.

orion-light.why: Elder ordeal: walk the talk consistently under visibility.

pleiades.why: Focus is conduct integrity, not bonding/soothing.

sirius.why: Conduct sage—teaches the law of right behavior through embodied example.
